content: Hey! I'm going to the next FHIR Application Roundtable in December. It's on the 6th and 7th. Donâ€™t miss the chance to demo your FHIR app at the HL7 FHIR Applications Roundtable December 6-7 and LSU in New Orleans. Submit your interest in presenting by October 15 here: https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/G6FW92Q. More information about this fun and fast-paced event is found here: http://www.hl7.org/events/fhir/roundtable/2017/12/demos.cfm.
I don't get out of the office much so going to New Orleans and putting names with faces will be very enjoyable.
